title: Wear Big Digital Watch Face
summary: Wear Big Digital Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches
description: This is a very basic version, later you can customize the clock (color, size, end so on..)This is for square Android Wear smartwatches: Sony Smartwatch 3, LG G Watch, Asus Zenwatch, Samsung Gear Live.Later it will support round watches.If you don't like the "style" don't download :) If you like, please rate the watch face, thanks!
descriptionHTML:
This is a very basic version, later you can customize the clock (color, size, end so on..)

This is for square Android Wear smartwatches: Sony Smartwatch 3, LG G Watch, Asus Zenwatch, Samsung Gear Live.
Later it will support round watches.

If you don't like the "style" don't download :) If you like, please rate the watch face, thanks!
comments: Still no customability options yet, but the simple design feels like it fills up more space on my LG G Watch than most other watch faces I've got, leaving my screen look a little less empty while displaying the time in an easy-to-read, neat-looking style.
Excellent Like it a lot, will be better once you upload the colours but makes my watch feel new and different.
